sentences.en: " The damned eagle's claw is hooked in! "
sentences.cn: “ 这可恶的老鹰爪子是倒钩!

sentences.en: By instinct he catches hold of a small tree with his right claw.
sentences.cn: 他那只无望的右爪本能地抓住一棵矮树的枝干,一下就抓住不放了.

sentences.en: Claw me and I'll claw thee.
sentences.cn: 善来好往,一逗一诺,互相迎合.

sentences.en: clawing back power from the president.
I had to claw my way to where I am today.
sentences.cn: 我只有一路奋斗才有今天.

sentences.en: In the meantime his generals will want to claw back some of their old influence.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，他的将军们还想东山再起。

sentences.en: It has three pairs of legs, each ending in a large claw.
sentences.cn: 它有3对腿，每条腿上都有一只巨爪。

sentences.en: It is not the sap within the furrowed bark, nor aa claw.
sentences.cn: 她不是蕴涵在皱褶树皮下的汁液, 也不是利爪下垂死的小鸟.

sentences.en: It turns to bite the eagle's claw off , but the pain becomes more acute.
sentences.cn: 它试着扭过身去咬, 但一拽更疼.

sentences.en: Ligulate flower has long claw, the brim knits music.
sentences.cn: 舌状花有长爪, 边缘皱曲.

sentences.en: Scientists call this claw shape the antibody molecule's idiotype.
sentences.cn: 科学家称这种爪型为抗体微小颗粒的遗传型.

sentences.en: Some did manage to claw their way up iron ladders to the safety of the upper deck.
sentences.cn: 的确有人设法抓住铁梯爬上了顶层甲板，脱离了危险。

sentences.en: The cat dug his claws into my leg.
sentences.cn: 猫的爪子抓进了我的腿中。

sentences.en: The Chancellor will try to claw back £3.5 billion in next year's Budget.
sentences.cn: 财政大臣在明年的预算中将争取收回35亿英镑。

sentences.en: The dogs continued to paw and claw frantically at the chain mesh.
sentences.cn: 那些狗继续用爪子疯狂地抓铁丝网。

sentences.en: The male crab's claw is much bigger than left one.
sentences.cn: 雄蟹的惟右剪是白色的,和比左剪非常大的.

sentences.en: The wolf clawed at the tree and howled the whole night.
sentences.cn: 那只狼在那颗树上抓挠，还嗥叫了整整一个晚上。

sentences.en: What is the function of a cat's claw?

words.tran_cn: 抓（claw的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 羊角锤；木工锤；燕尾服；拔钉锤
（奋力但缓慢地）重新获得失去的优势或地位

trans.tran_en: a sharp curved nail on an animal, bird, or some insects
to tear or pull at something, using claws or your fingers
